content: hippopotamigurumi pattern by ambroscrochet every part of the hippopotamus except for the nose is worked in rounds - do not join at the end of each round finished size approximately 15 cm 5 9 inches yarn i use 100% acrylic yarn schachenmayr bravo to be precise you can use whatever yarn and colors work for you crochet hook 3 mm you will also need pins scissors tapestry needle or needle and thread 12 mm safety eyes or needle and black thread toy stuffing abbreviations and stitches used magic_ring single_crochet = single_crochet increase = increase decrease = decrease back loops only = blo chain = chain fasten_off = f/o → how to read the pattern round x we are working on round x → x single_crochet increase/decrease * y the instructions between parentheses have to be repeated y times x single_crochet increase/decrease means we will work one single_crochet in each x stitches and then work one increase or one decrease into the next stitch for example 3 single_crochet increase * 6 means work one single_crochet in each of the next three stitches one increase in the fourth stitch repeat six times → x single_crochet increase/decrease work one single_crochet in each of the x stitches then work one increase/decrease in the next stitch if you have any questions you can reach me on instagram @robiambros or on facebook @ambroscrochet make sure to tag me if you post pictures of your finished amigurumi if you need a refresher on some stitches i have a series of tutorials on my igtv if you feel like supporting my patterns you can do so through my ko-fi 1 head start with a
